# Redtail Technology

**Website:** https://redtailtechnology.com  
**Category:** CRM (Customer Relationship Management) for Financial Advisors  
**Status:** Pricing & Features Complete  

## Company Overview

Redtail Technology provides a purpose-built CRM platform designed specifically for financial services professionals. The company offers tools to help financial advisors and their teams manage client relationships, automate workflows, and maintain compliance with industry regulations.

Founded in 2003, Redtail was acquired by Orion in 2022 and now functions as part of Orion's broader advisor tech platform, enabling deeper integration between Redtail CRM, Orion Planning and Orion Portfolio View.

## Contact Information

**Corporate Site:** https://corporate.redtailtechnology.com  

## Product Category

**Primary:** Financial Services CRM  
**Industry Focus:** Financial Advisors, RIAs, Broker-Dealers  

## Brief Description

Redtail is a comprehensive CRM solution built for the financial services industry, helping advisors stay organized, strengthen client relationships, and simplify compliance. The platform includes:

- **CRM:** Client data management, communication tracking, workflow automation
- **Speak:** Compliant text messaging with CRM integration
- **Imaging:** Document management and storage
- **Email:** Automated email capture and archiving

Key features include:
- Integration with 100+ industry tools (Orion, Schwab, eMoney, etc.)
- Workflow automation and task management
- Compliance tools for SEC and FINRA guidelines
- Multi-office support and supervision capabilities
- 30-day free trial with all features

## Pricing Tiers

| Plan | Annual Price | Monthly Price | User Limit | Free Trial |
|------|-------------|---------------|------------|------------|
| **Launch** | $39/user/month | $45/user/month | Up to 5 users | 30 days |
| **Growth** | $59/user/month | $65/user/month | Unlimited users | 30 days |
| **Enterprise** | Custom pricing | Custom pricing | Unlimited users | Contact sales |

**Notes:**
- Free trial is of the full Redtail Growth Plan (new users only)
- Enterprise tier requires minimum license commitment
- All pricing is per user, per month
- Annual billing provides ~13-15% savings vs monthly billing

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities (All Plans)

**Contact & Account Management:**
- Contact management with customizable fields
- Account-level user-defined fields
- Client segmentation tools
- Account management
- Relationship mapping

**Communication & Compliance:**
- Compliant note-taking and archiving
- Email templates
- Calendar tools with color-coding
- Office 365 and Google Calendar sync
- Customizable email notifications
- Dashboard reminders

**Sales & Pipeline Management:**
- Sales pipeline tracker
- Opportunity tracking
- Seminar management tools
- Lead tracking and nurturing

**Reporting & Data:**
- Customizable reports and database lists
- Standard report templates
- Data export capabilities
- Segmented lists and tags

**Mobile & Access:**
- Free mobile app (iOS and Android)
- Cloud-based access
- Teams access

**Setup & Support:**
- Complimentary database conversion
- Training through Redtail University
- Free phone and email support

**Integrations:**
- 100+ industry-leading integrations
- Integration with portfolio management tools
- Compliance tool connections
- Marketing automation integrations

### Advanced Features (Growth & Enterprise Plans)

**Workflow Automation:**
- Automated workflows for key tasks
- Client onboarding automation
- Review process automation
- Trigger-based actions
- Standardized process templates

**Email Capabilities:**
- Email syncing and automation templates
- Automated email capture and archiving
- Bulk email sending

**Add-On Products (Growth & Enterprise):**

**Redtail Imaging:**
- Document organization and management
- Secure document storage
- Document archiving

**Redtail Speak:**
- Compliant text messaging
- CRM-integrated communications
- Fully archived messaging
- AI assistant for streamlined communication

**Orion Planning Integration (Growth Plan):**
- Behavioral finance tools
- 3D risk analysis
- Secure client portal
- Financial planning tools
- Document sharing
- Meeting prep tools

### Enterprise-Only Features

- Centralized visibility and supervision
- Multi-office support capabilities
- Enterprise-grade integrations
- Supervision workflows
- Audit trail management
- Rep onboarding tools
- Custom pricing and licensing

### Limitations

- No 24/7/365 support (Monday-Friday, 5 AM - 5 PM PT only)
- Limited AI functionality (mostly via Redtail Speak/Orion integrations)
- Less customization than some competitors (e.g., Salesforce)
- User interface aesthetics considered outdated by some users
- Not all desktop functionality available in mobile app
- Occasional bugs reported by users
